name: Howl you doin?
description:
You've landed yourself a date! Congrats, but that's the easy part. Now you must not show your "wild" side, that's more like date 3.

Make sure your thirst for blood doesnt reach the max, but also make sure to spend time with your date. 

Balance the two sides of humanity and beast, can YOU do it?

==controls==

WASD -Move

F - Attack

Space - Transform

Programming by BearParkGames

Art By Thomas Sayle

Music by Bruno Almedia
